CPTimeFormatter Class Reference

A number formatter that converts time intervals to dates. Useful for formatting labels on an axis. If you choose the numerical scale of the plot space to be in seconds, axis labels can be directly generated by setting a CPTimeFormatter as the tickLabelFormatter. More...

Properties

NSDateFormatter * dateFormatter
 The date formatter used to generate strings from time intervals.
NSDate * referenceDate
 Date from which time intervals are taken. If nil, the standard reference date (1 January 2001, GMT) is used.

Detailed Description

A number formatter that converts time intervals to dates. Useful for formatting labels on an axis. If you choose the numerical scale of the plot space to be in seconds, axis labels can be directly generated by setting a CPTimeFormatter as the tickLabelFormatter.
